text: Gmail is an email service developed for limited release in 2004 and fully launched in 2009 by Google.

Outlook.com is an email service connected to a web-based suite of contacts, tasks, and calendaring services. One of the world's first webmail services, it was founded in 1996 as Hotmail, then re-launched as MSN Hotmail after Microsoft acquired it in 1997. It was later rebranded to Windows Live Hotmail, then re-launched as Outlook.com in 2013.
Yahoo Mail is a web-based email service launched by Yahoo! Inc. in 1997.
Daum Mail is the main email service of Kakao, a South Korean internet company established in 2014 following the merger of Daum Communications and Kakao.
Yandex.mail is an email service offered by the Russian company Yandex N.V. .
Mail.Ru is an email service started in 1998 by the Russian Internet company also named Mail.Ru.
